overview: Madame Tussauds is one of the UK's most loved and enduring visitor attractions and has always been a barometer of popularity. Filmed across a year at Madame Tussauds' London and Blackpool locations, following the creation and launch of new wax figures for pop sensation, Little Mix, and YouTube superstar DanTDM.
title: Madame Tussauds: The Full Wax
